subject: Horse Racing
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: The owner and trainer of Tonalist, the Belmont Stakes winner, understood why Steve Coburn, a co-owner of California Chrome, was upset, but the reality was that they put their horse first.
snippet: The owner and trainer of Tonalist, the Belmont Stakes winner, understood why Steve Coburn, a co-owner of California Chrome, was upset, but the reality was that they put their horse first.
